actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to provide for the construction of a public building in Tallahassee, Fla.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of General Services to construct a public building for the housing of Federal employees in Tallahassee, Florida.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to provide for the construction of a public building in Tallahassee, Fla.
